title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person looking at the living while he is silent, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a dead person looking at the living while silent It is one of the important visions that you should pay close attention to. There is no doubt that the dead person carries with him important messages for the dreamer, all from God Almighty, to be a warning and clarification of many important matters, and the dream can be an indication of the deceased's need for begging and charity. Interpretations of the majority of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person looking at the living while silent We find that the interpretation of dreams of a dead person looking at the living while silent indicates the dead person's desire to show some things to the dreamer, so the dreamer must understand the path of the dead to be able to help him and know what he wants. Take him where he falls into mistakes and problems. If the deceased smiles at the dreamer, this is evidence of his complete satisfaction with him, as he is on the right path and does good and does not approach evil and completely abandons all the evil thoughts that he has had for a while, and we find that. The vision contains a clear warning of death, so he loves to stay away from sins and repent quickly. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person looking at the living while he is silent by Ibn Sirin Our respected Sheikh Ibn Sirin explains to us that the interpretation of a dream about a dead person is looking at the living while he is silent and approaching him and hitting him with the need to stay away from all the actions he intends to do. As the vision is limited to the dreamer who takes wrong paths that lead to many sins, so the dead person advises him to stay away from his mistake. We find that the dream expresses the need to be careful not to commit sins, so what is with God is much better than this righteous world. If the deceased smiles, this indicates a happy life and an increase in money and children, and if the dreamer is married and if he is single, this indicates his relationship with a suitable woman who appreciates and supports him, and the vision also expresses the dreamer's rise in the job, which makes him one of the lucky ones in terms of increasing salary and social status. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person looking at the living while he is silent about the free The interpretation of a dream about a dead person looking at the living while he is silent in freedom differs according to the appearance of the dead, so if he is happy, this indicates her close marriage to the person who makes her heart happy and comfortable with him. If the deceased is sad, we find that the dream is a clear warning of the need to stay away from fleeting desires so that she can satisfy her desires without falling into mistakes and problems. If the deceased is from her family, such as a father, this is clear evidence of her longing for him and her desire to see him, which makes her see him in her dream, so she always prays for him, and gives charity to him. Spirit. And if the deceased gives her something, it indicates that she will gain a lot of profits in her next life. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person looking at the living and he is silent about a married woman Seeing the dead person looking at the living and he is silent about a married woman is evidence of her calm life with her husband, especially if the deceased is smiling, as we find that the happiness of the deceased is evidence of peace of mind. The living and the peaceful life in which he lives, and as for his sadness, the meanings are many, as the dead person may need charity from the dreamer, and he may blame her for committing a mistake he does, so he should pay attention. To praying and supplicating on the road

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about finding a golden earring in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about finding a gold earring. The interpretation of a dream about finding a gold earring in a dream includes multiple indicators according to the shape and length of the neck. Was it heavy or light? Where did the dreamer find his neck? And if you want to know the meaning of these symbols, all you have to do is read the article below, and you will discover the meaning of your dream in detail. You have a dream that confuses you and you are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about finding a gold earring. Finding a gold earring in a dream shows great pride and authority. For the dreamer who works in reality and wants to achieve her professional ambitions in her life and gain status and money. Jurists said that gold in most cases for men indicates corruption and following desires, especially if a man finds gold and wears it in a dream, then he may engage in reprehensible behaviors in his life, such as imitating women and imitating It has some behaviour. And this topic is hatred for religion. If the golden earring that the woman found was long, this symbolizes the abundance of money and her high status. If it was long and heavy, but she enjoyed it, then this is a new responsibility for her, and although it is a bit big, she will carry it out to the fullest. Interpretation of the dream of finding a gold earring by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that the beautiful ring in a married woman’s dream indicates happiness and prosperity. Even if she wears many types of gold, such as earrings, rings and bracelets, the dream shows her many offspring in the future. He pointed out that the earrings In a dream, it indicates the dreamer’s desire to engage in any work related to music and playing, and she will live from this work, and God will give her a lot of blue if the earring is intact and light on the ear. Ibn Sirin had a different opinion from the rest of the jurists in interpreting the neck for a man, as he pointed out The dreamer who sees himself wearing earrings in a dream, God has blessed him with the beautiful voice that he uses in recitation. The Qur’an if the dreamer is religious and if he does not have his religion, then the vision shows his interest in singing and singing more than the Qur’an and he may become a singer in the future. Interpretation of a dream about finding a gold earring for a single woman: An unmarried woman who searches a lot for suitable earrings in a dream, and after suffering she finds a suitable earring For her, the earrings in this dream indicate the husband that the dreamer was looking for and will meet in the near future, and she will have certain characteristics such as high status and generosity and she is able to give birth, and God will grant her this good offspring. If the dreamer finds a suitable earring for her and an unknown girl steals it in the dream, then this He warns her that there are girls who hate her and when she finds her life partner, in reality there are a number of cunning girls who want the relationship. If she fails, she will rise up and perhaps one of them will succeed. When a knowledge seeker sees that she is wearing a lot of gold, she will have a great relationship in the future, and her success will be her ally in life and she can work In a special job in her field of study and getting a lot of money from it. Interpretation of a dream about finding a gold earring for a married woman

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing a university in a dream

preview.html: University in a dream is one of the recurring dreams that many people see, and they wonder and seek what this vision shows, and is it a symbol of good or evil, as senior legal translators and dream specialists reported that the interpretations of university dreams in a dream have many interpretations that differ from one translator to another, so we will explain them to you in detail in this article. University in a dream The interpretation of a dream about a university in a dream indicates that the person who saw the university in a dream indicates that this dreamer is characterized by good morals and perpetuates charitable works and assistance. Whoever sees a university in a dream, this is evidence that he works in trade in a smart and profitable way and has sufficient experience and skill in managing commercial projects that bring livelihood and a lot of money. As for whoever sees a university in a dream and is persistent in attending, this means that this visionary excels in his artistic works represented in art, thought and creativity. On the other hand, the dream of going to university indicates the dreamer's desire to increase learning and culture. Seeing the difficulty of studying at a university in a dream indicates difficulties and suffering. If a person dreams that he is studying at a university, this is a sign of good luck and a high and famous position among people. The dreamer who sees in a dream that he goes to The university, so the vision shows his scientific activity. The person who sees in his dream that he has become a student and returned to go to university, the vision shows the intensity of sadness and many worries that will make the dreamer yearn and long for the days of youth full of joy, happiness and freedom. From distress and anxiety. If a person sees in a dream that he was visiting the university in which he studied and graduated, the dream indicates that the dreamer will suffer from stress and fatigue that will disrupt his life. The person who dreams that he is sitting in the university surrounded by flowers and green herbs, the dream shows the bad thoughts that people think about in front of that person and he is innocent of them. The university in a dream for Ibn Sirin Seeing the university in a dream for Ibn Sirin means that goals and hopes will be achieved soon and we will reach them without difficulties. Entering the university in a dream indicates that the owner of the dream is a good and virtuous person. But if the merchant sees that he entered the university in a dream, this is evidence that he will make great profits. Going to the university in a dream indicates ambition and determination to achieve the desired goal in life. The difficulty of studying in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will not be able to easily achieve what he seeks. Suffering at the university in a dream indicates entering into a failed experience. The specialized online dream interpretation site is distinguished by a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the dream interpretation site on Google. University of dreams for singles Seeing a university in a dream for singles can be a sign of promotion and reaching the highest levels of success in life. An unmarried girl who continues her university studies in a dream indicates that she will marry a young man she loves. But if the girl visits the university from which she graduated

title: Interpretation of a dream about hunting a falcon in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a falcon in a dream for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, whether you have chased a peregrine falcon. In dreaming of a falcon in a dream, the dreamer may be upset if he dreams of it, because the falcon is a bird of prey, and it is fast and widespread, it can It causes anxiety and tension to those who see it. Many people search for the interpretation of a falcon in a dream today. Interpretation of hunting a falcon in a dream. Whoever dreams that he hunts a falcon and chases it, this indicates the king’s injustice towards him. As for whoever sees that the angel gives him a falcon attributed to the king while hunting with him, then he will join the service of a king and gain honor and rank for him. And he oppresses others. And whoever sees that a falcon hunts and catches it, he will gain power over the great man and conquer him. But whoever dreams that he hunted a falcon and does not chase it, he will have a son, and whoever dreams that he eats its flesh and then his son grows up will be punished with pain and hardship. If you see a falcon in a dream, this means The dream that the dreamer desires will come true. Hunting a falcon in the dreamer indicates positive changes and the arrival of happy news soon. Whoever sees a falcon in his vision means that he is suffering from thinking about many things and many problems, but they will certainly be solved, God willing. Hunting a wild falcon in a dream indicates an evil son who He does not take care of his parents, which will cause them a lot of trouble. Hunting a falcon in a dream indicates that the dreamer will get a suitable job from which he can earn a lot of living. Hunting falcons in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be close to those with power and status in society, such as being a friend of a minister. Or a boss, manager, or the like. Having a pet falcon in a dream and catching it indicates the presence of strong relationships and loyal friends and that these relationships will benefit him in the near future. Hunting a wild falcon in a dream indicates hypocrisy and hypocrites and shows confusion in life and loss of stability in life. Using a weapon In a dream to hunt a falcon, this indicates that the dreamer has a strong personality and strong determination and influences those who are higher than him in position or position. In the event that the dreamer sees himself chasing a falcon in a dream and then leaves it, the dream indicates that he is not taking advantage of the opportunities available to him in the desired manner. Letting a falcon fly in a dream after hunting means losing opportunities and indicates the presence of one of the children who will make you tired and make you suffer because of his bad behavior. Interpretation of hunting a falcon in a young man’s dream. Seeing a falcon hunting in the dream of a young man who has not yet married indicates the existence of a desire that he has long desired. If a man sees In a dream, a hawk flies over his head, but without harming him, this is evidence that the dreamer will gain power or authority. And if someone sees in a dream that a hawk is standing on his shoulder, this is evidence that the dreamer will triumph over an enemy who has wronged him one day. But if one sees In a dream that someone gives him a falcon as a gift, this is evidence of the large amounts of money that the dreamer will gain from a deal that he will make soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a young man sees in a dream a falcon approaching him, this is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a large sum in his studies, because the falcon indicates To victory. And in

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a single woman’s tooth extraction in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of tooth extraction in a dream for a single woman: Many girls see a tooth coming out in a dream and believe that it is a sign of sadness and sorrow as a result of the pain that accompanies the extraction or loss of a tooth, but in fact the interpretation of this dream varies depending on the condition of the tooth itself, because the loss of a damaged tooth is different from a healthy and healthy tooth. , not the lower tooth, and we look in our article at the interpretations related to this vision. Interpretation of tooth extraction in a dream for a single woman. What is the interpretation of tooth extraction in a dream for a single woman? The interpretation of a dream of tooth extraction for a single woman shows some indications according to the things seen in the dream, and in general, experts explain that The interpretation of this dream could be evidence of some of the psychological problems that she faces and the depression that she sees during her days. Some interpretive scholars prove that the extraction of a tooth can be explained by this girl’s exposure to a difficult shock in her life that affected all of her affairs and may be related to the death of one of her family members. If the girl feels With loneliness and emotional instability, and she saw teeth falling out, this is an expression of this bad condition and her desire for someone to help her and support her in her affairs. And the loss of the teeth located at the bottom of the mouth is good news for her in the absence of a feeling of sadness and the distance from her loneliness.. As for the loss of any tooth located at the top Mouth in the mouth, it is possible that this girl will lose a very dear one. The girl may not be able to achieve a large part of her dreams or lose her money if she finds healthy teeth falling out of her mouth. It can be said that a tooth falling out of the teeth is a sign of happiness in a dream, so if it Debts that he can repay and repay, God willing. And if the teeth came out of her mouth but she found them and did not disappear and disappear, then this dream can be interpreted as good news, as opposed to the loss and loss of teeth. What is the interpretation of a tooth being extracted in a dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin depicts the girl who sees a tooth coming out in the The dream means that she loses a dear and close person, such as a life partner, who may turn away from her after this dream, because she loses the ability to complete and understand. With him. This dream can also be associated with friends, friends, or even family members who may lose the girl and move away from her after her dream, and it is a sign of loss and loss, especially if this extraction is not accompanied by any feeling of pain. The scholar Ibn Sirin goes to the idea that tooth extraction It could be a sign of the loss of desires and dreams, especially after this girl failed to reach them through her continuous search for them. Ibn Sirin predicts that a tooth falling out at the top of the girl’s mouth will be an unpleasant vision, as it is a sign of death and loss. It appears that the girl who has debts can pay them off. If she sees all her teeth falling out at the same time, she may be able to pay off part of this debt by having one or more teeth fall out. A dream. Ibn Sirin predicts that the gradual loss of teeth is confirmation of the longevity that you will enjoy and through which you can fulfill many dreams. If the teeth were extracted and found inside the palm of her hand, the dream is not considered good, as it indicates that she will

title: The difference between a dream and a nightmare by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The difference between a dream and a nightmare: From time to time a person needs to do the process of relaxing everything, whether the body or the mind, because it gives the body an opportunity to rest and separate from real life, so that we can work on calming the body and brain. To protect them from any harm during this. The topic shows dreams and nightmares, which are everything that a person experiences, integrated into it, and many scholars differed in knowing the difference between a dream and a nightmare and getting to know them closely. Follow us in this article. Interpretation of the meaning of a dream. There are many scholars who have interpreted the word dream. Some of them said that we can describe a dream as that state that describes the sensations that a person experiences and are embodied in the form of images or ideas that come from the subconscious mind and exceed the will of the conscious mind, because the subconscious mind sometimes greatly controls our dreams, appearing to us in the form of dreams, and this dream explains A purely psychological explanation. We also find that the stage of deep sleep in which a person enters and the eye movement is completely related to dreaming, it is close to consciousness to some extent, because in this stage the brain is in an active state. We also note that the duration of the dream varies from one person to another. There are those who remember the dream as soon as they wake up from sleep, and this stage is called the rapid eye movement stage in which the brain is in a state of alertness. Some scientists say that the average person may dream three to five dreams per day, and these A normal ratio during the night. We also find that there is a strong connection between morals and the subconscious mind called the black box to store everything inside us, and we always find that there are some hiccups until we bring out what is inside us, so the dream is an image of the projection of what is inside us, which is controlled by the subconscious mind In an unconscious way to the individual. Interpretation of the concept of nightmareA nightmare is a dream that a person dreams of, but it includes frightening and unpleasant events, so the dreamer feels sad, anxious and terrified when the nightmare comes to him. This dream may indicate that the person is going through difficult situations and needs the courage to face all situations with a great sense of Comfort and that the person is always in a state of anxiety. As a result of the dreamer seeing a nightmare, it affects the body and mind significantly and makes him feel very upset and tired. Nightmares can occur as a result of a person being exposed to a lot of stress and they can occur as a result of eating food before sleep, which leads to an increase in metabolic disorders as well as Increased brain activity and anxiety, which can be a result of a person's suffering. From certain diseases, including fever. We notice that the person suffering from the nightmare wakes up immediately and feels insomnia as a result of difficulty sleeping. The difference between a dream and a nightmare Each of them is directly related to the state of sleep and the appearance of each of them crystallizes in the person’s mind, which is a projection of his subconscious side, so It is difficult for one to distinguish a dream from a nightmare. . , including common elements. A dream can spread between people and it is a normal thing that we can explain, but a nightmare is something unusual that expresses a negative experience that leads to a feeling of anxiety.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant man?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant man? Today, through the various website, are we talking about the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant man? As interpreted by the two worlds, I saw a man dreaming a dream, indicating the many riches and riches that he can enjoy in this earthly life. Others interpreted it as a sign of sudden death, and God Almighty knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant man? (Ibn Sirin) The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that if a man sees himself pregnant, this indicates wealth and goodness, and if he sees himself giving birth from his mouth, this indicates the dreamer’s early death. Interpretation of dreams that I am pregnant with a girl. Interpretation of dreams that I am pregnant with a girl shows a good wife with good morals. . This wife seeks to maintain her home and live a life full of happiness. If the dreamer sees that his stomach is swollen, this indicates distress and anxiety, and it also indicates that his condition has improved to a better condition, and God Almighty knows best. I dreamed that someone I know is pregnant. The interpretation of the dream that someone I know or a friend of mine is pregnant is in kindness. Also, the interpretation varies depending on the size of the pregnant woman's abdomen. If the size of her belly is very large, this indicates the coming happiness of that person and her freedom from problems and worries. It also indicates that the dreamer will reach a high position, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a single woman. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that if an unmarried woman sees herself pregnant in a dream, this indicates However, this girl has chastity and good morals and that this girl is close to God. Soon, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream that I dream of twins. Scientists have interpreted that if a married woman dreams that she is pregnant with twins when she is actually pregnant, this indicates the difficulty of pregnancy, the deterioration of her health and psychological condition, and the difficulty of giving birth. What is the interpretation of a pregnant man’s dream? For divorced women, scholars have interpreted that the dream of a divorced woman while she is pregnant indicates that she is free of the causes that cause her psychological and health deterioration and is free of problems. She declares that she is an ideal mother and that her children will return to her. Interpretation of a dream about carrying a man. Some scholars have explained that if a man sees himself pregnant and his stomach is abnormally large, this indicates that he is hiding a big secret from his family and is afraid of the scandals that he may be exposed to. Interpretation of a dream about a man’s pregnancy and then giving birth. He has interpreted Some people of knowledge say that if he sees himself pregnant and then gives birth to a child and that child is a male, this indicates the livelihood that the person will obtain, and his wife will give birth to a woman, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of transporting another person in a dream. The dream of transporting someone in a dream has been interpreted, and who is this person, it was said. Tell me about the problems, fears and difficulties that this person endures. Be responsible for her at work, and God Almighty knows best. Other interpretations of the dream symbol of a man being transported in a dream: If the dreamer sees that she is pregnant and she is very happy, this may indicate the kindness and livelihood that the dreamer will receive and also indicates victory and marriage in the near future for the single person. But if the sick person sees that His mother is pregnant with him and gave birth to him, so this is a sign of the approaching death of that person, and God Almighty knows best. Some commentators say that a dream about a pregnant man is an unpleasant dream for

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of running and escaping from someone for a dream. The site administrators do not provide interpretations, but rather they are from the heart the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from someone in a dream. Running and escaping in a dream may indicate difficult circumstances that the dreamer is going through during this time. If one sees that He was running and running away from something, this may indicate his fear of unknown or unhappy events that he is going through. In the event that one saw that he was running and running away from someone, this may indicate many difficult times that the dreamer is going through in His life. Seeing a person that he was running and escaping from something may indicate that he has been exposed to harm or a problem that he may be exposed to and must seek help from God. Interpretation of a dream about running after a small child in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he was running after a small child can It indicates a large number of changes occurring in the dreamer's life during this period. If one saw that he was running after a small child, this may indicate the pressure that the dreamer felt during those days. In case one saw that he was running after a small child In a dream, this may indicate the optimism and happiness that the dreamer will gain during this period. Whoever dreams that he is running after a small child may indicate the happiness that the dreamer experienced during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running with my girlfriend in a dream. Anyone can see in a dream. That he was running with his friend on the road indicates the many benefits that the dreamer will receive in those days. If one saw that he was running with his friend, this may indicate that things and circumstances have changed for the better. If one saw that he was running with his friend in In a dream, this may indicate some of the joys and happiness that happen to the dreamer during those days. If one sees that he was running with his friend, the dream may indicate the joys and pleasure that the dreamer felt at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in a race in A dream: A person dreaming of being in a rasa may indicate that the dreamer was searching for food at that time. In the event that a person saw that he was running a race in a dream, this may indicate the halal money that the dreamer had earned at that time. It is possible that the dream By running in a race indicates the psychological comfort that was present in the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. A person’s vision may indicate that he was running in a race, which may indicate rejection of the worries and problems that the dreamer was facing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of running without shoes in a dream: In the event that someone sees that he is running barefoot, this may indicate changes that may occur in his life during this period and he must ask God for help. A person’s dream that he was running without shoes may indicate a financial loss that may The person having the vision is suffering from it at that time. It is possible that the person’s vision shows that he was running without shoes, which may indicate some problems and difficulties that the person having the vision faces in that vision.
